body:
Add Picard versions 2.25.x which includes multiple bug fixes and added features.

**Summarized Changelog:**
- fix underflow in HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromContaminatorSequence.
- and nio access in Fingerprinting code (no need to panic)
- Pass MAX_RECORDS_IN_RAM to BasecallsConverter.
- Only read the cbcl header once the tile is about to be cached and then close the streams.
- Added ref to software catalogs to citation section.

Full changelog can be found [here](https://github.com/broadinstitute/picard/releases/).

**Test Plan:**
Picard v2.25.7 built in the Autamus Build Workflow [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/runs/3134784748).
title: Add Picard v2.25.x
